Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《昌石の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Chang Shi's Key》</COL>to open it.

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《財宝の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Hoard Key》</COL>to open it.

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《宝飾の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You'll need<COL ffdc78>"Jewelry Key"</COL>to open it.

Source string: 白竜杯に参加可能になりました
Translation: Participation in the Hakuryu Cup is now possible.

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
解放には<COL ffdc78>《宝飾の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>"Jewelry Key"</COL>to unlock it.

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>敵との戦闘で一度も死亡状態になりませんでした
クリア時のボーナス報酬が多くなります</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>I never went into a death state in combat with the enemy
More bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>パーティーメンバーが死亡状態になりました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が下がります</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Party members are now in a dead state
Bonus rewards for clearing are lowered</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>胞子の広がりを阻止――！
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Stop the spread of spores--!
Additional bonus rewards for clearing the site</COL>

Source string: 敵はあわてて逃げ出した！
Translation: The enemy fled in a panic!

Source string: 胞子が集まり始めている――
Translation: The spores are beginning to gather--

Source string: 汚染植物が出現――！
Translation: Contaminated plants appear--!

Source string:
胞子の広がりを阻止――
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加！
Translation:
Stop the spread of spores--
Added bonus rewards for clearing the site!

Source string: 隠れていた魔物が姿を現した――！
Translation: The demon that had been hiding has revealed itself--!

Source string:
傷ついた魔物の痕跡は、
住処へと続いているようだ――
Translation:
The trail of wounded demons seems to lead to
dwellings--

Source string: 救助対象が疲れてきたようだ――
Translation: The rescue target seems to be getting tired--

Source string: 救助対象はかなり辛そうだ――
Translation: The rescue target seems to be in a lot of pain--

Source string: 救助対象が戦線離脱した――
Translation: The rescue target has left the line of fire--

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に成功しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Successful quick rescue
Additional bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

Source string:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に失敗しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬は追加されません</COL>
Translation:
<COL ffdc78>Quick rescue failed
No additional bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

Source string:
鍵がかかっている――
開くには<COL ffdc78>《<NAME ITEM>》</COL>が必要だ
Translation:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《<NAME ITEM>》</COL>to open it.

Source string: 今は転移の力を失っているようだ――
Translation: Now it seems to have lost the power of transition--

Source string:
イベントを進行しますか？
※パーティー要請中の場合はキャンセルされます
Translation:
Would you like to proceed with the event?
*If a party is being requested, it will be canceled.

Source string: 準備開始
Translation: Commencement of Preparations

Source string: キャンセル
Translation: cancel

Source string: イベント進行確認
Translation: Confirmation of event progress

Source string: 進行する
Translation: Progress.

Source string: 準備解除
Translation: removal (easing) of (official) restrictions

Source string: キャンセル
Translation: cancel

Source string: 新たな証拠品を手に入れた！
Translation: We have a new piece of evidence!

Source string: 誰かの話し声が聞こえる――
Translation: I hear someone talking--

Source string: 憲兵が見張っている――この先には行けなさそうだ
Translation: The Kempeitai are on the lookout--I don't think we can go any further.

Source string: 誰かが襲われている！　助けなければ――
Translation: Someone is being attacked!　We have to help--

Source string: 遠くから悲鳴が聞こえた――
Translation: I heard a scream in the distance--

Source string: どこからか剣戟の音が聞こえる――
Translation: From somewhere I hear the sound of sword fights--

Source string: レジスタンスに新たな仲間が加わった！
Translation: A new addition to the resistance!

Source string: 諜報活動領域外へ移動したため、クエストを終了しました
Translation: Quest terminated due to movement outside the intelligence area.

Source string: 諜報任務が進行した――
Translation: An intelligence mission was underway--

Source string: ハントターゲットを討伐した！
Translation: Hunt targets were taken down!

Source string: ボーナスターゲットを討伐した！
Translation: Bonus targets were defeated!

Source string: 闇の力によって封じられている
Translation: Sealed by the forces of darkness.

Source string: ハントターゲットを発見した！
Translation: Hunt target found!

Source string: ボーナスターゲットを発見した！
Translation: Bonus target found!

Source string: 封鎖されたエリアが解放された――
Translation: The cordoned off area was liberated--

Source string:
メインクエストが進行可能になりました
一度パーティーを解散してからトラバースに話しかけて下さい
Translation:
The main quest is now ready to proceed
Once you break up the party, please talk to Travers.

Source string: レスタニア
Translation: Lestania

Source string: メルゴダ下層
Translation: Mergoda Lower Level

Source string: メルゴダ王宮層
Translation: Mergoda Royal Palace Level

Source string: 魔赤島
Translation: Bloodbane Isle

Source string: フィンダム
Translation: Phindym

Source string: アッカーシェラン
Translation: Acre Selund

Source string: アッカーシェラン[過去]
Translation: Acre Selund (Past)

Source string: 黒呪の迷宮
Translation: Bitterblack Maze

Source string: <LQEM>を討伐：<VAL> / <VAL>
Translation: Defeat <LQEM>: <VAL> / <VAL>

Source string: <LQIM>を入手：<VAL> / <VAL>
Translation: Obtain <LQIM>: <VAL> / <VAL>

Source string: <LQIM>を納品
Translation: <LQIM> is ready to be delivered.

Source string: （%s%d:%02d時点集計）
Translation: (Tallied at %s %d:%02d)

Source string: イベント合計
Translation: Event Total

Source string: PM
Translation: afternoon

Source string: AM
Translation: AM

Source string: 現在の自分のあげたチョコの数
Translation: Number of chocolate given

Source string: 合計
Translation: Total

Source string:
『大いなる理（ことわり）は我々が信じているよりも
ずっと脆かったと考えるより他はありません』
Translation:
We have no choice but to believe that the Great Reason is far
more fragile than we have been led to believe."

Source string:
『たったひとりの人間の野心が世界のありようを
変えてしまったのですから』
Translation:
'Because one man's ambition has changed the way the world
is.'

Source string: エルテ・ディナンで見つかった古文書より
Translation: From an ancient document found in Erte Dinan

Source string: その豊穣なる大地の名はレスタニア――
Translation: The name of that fertile land is Lestania.

Source string: 白竜の翼の下――
Translation: Under the wings of the white dragon

Source string: 人々は生まれ
Translation: People are born

Source string: 働き
Translation: function

Source string: 笑った
Translation: I laughed.

Source string: 竜への崇敬と感謝が文明を育み――
Translation: The reverence and appreciation of the dragon fostered a civilization--

Source string:
人の叡智は生と死の理すら
乗り越えようとしていた
Translation:
The wisdom of man was about to overcome
even the reason of life and death.

Source string: しかし
Translation: however
323 years ago--

Source string:
どこからともなく現れた黄金色の竜が
大いなる白竜に戦いを挑んだ
Translation:
A golden dragon appeared out of nowhere
and challenged the great white dragon to battle.

Source string: 戦いは三日三晩続き
Translation: The battle lasted three days and three nights

Source string: 誰もがその様子に固唾を呑んだ
Translation: Everyone held their breath at the sight of it.

Source string: 四日目の日の出前だった
Translation: It was before sunrise on the fourth day.

Source string: 祈りが通じたのだろうか――
Translation: I wonder if my prayers have been answered--

Source string: 白竜の痛撃が黄金の胸を貫き――
Translation: The white dragon's painful blow pierced through the golden chest.

Source string: まばゆい翼は光を失い
Translation: Dazzling wings lose their light

Source string: 堕ちた
Translation: fallen

Source string: 人々は胸を撫で下ろしたが――
Translation: People were patting their chests.

Source string: 白竜も深手を負い――
Translation: The white dragon was deeply wounded.

Source string: そして
Translation: and

Source string: 堕ちた
Translation: fallen

Source string: 頭を上げ、再び天空に昇ろうとしたが
Translation: He raised his head and tried to ascend into the sky again, but

Source string: かなわず――
Translation: I couldn't--

Source string: 人々は傷ついた白竜の周囲に集い
Translation: People gathered around the wounded white dragon.

Source string: 祈った
Translation: I prayed.

Source string: やがて白竜は弱々しい声で言った
Translation: Eventually the white dragon said in a weak voice

Source string: 『おまえたちを覚者にしてやろう』
Translation: "I will make you enlightened."

Source string: 『その代わりに――』
Translation: Instead--"

Source string: 『理の内に押し戻さねば――』

Translation: Enhancement of Dragon Abilities

Translation: Synthesis of Dragon Abilities

Translation: Equipment Disassembly

Source string: リワードミッション
Translation: Reward Missions

Translation: Portent of Destruction

Source string: 絶望の大陸 第五節　到達
Translation: The Land of Despair: Section V

Source string:
覚者よ――
新たなるポーンとの《戦徒の契り》を望むか
ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
Translation:
Wise men--
do you wish to "join forces" with a new pawn?
Then show me the proof of your qualification--
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> and</COL>

Source string:
――ううむ、覚者よ
そなたはまだ新たな契約を交わす段階にあらず
すでに己が器に応じた数の戦徒を統べているようだ
Translation:
--Ummm, Sensei,
you are not yet ready to sign a new contract,
you already seem to control a number of warriors in proportion to your capacity.

Source string:
――覚者よ
どうやらまだ、戦徒との新たな契約に
必要な数の<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>を
持ってはおらぬようだな
Translation:
--Wake up,
apparently you don't yet have the<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>required
number of
for a new contract with the warlords!

Source string:
契約に必要な数、<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を手に入れてのち
再び我にその証を示すがよい――
Translation:
Get the required number of<COL b92828><SPAI NUM></COL>for the contract and then
show me the proof again--and I will give you the proof again.

Source string:
――よかろう
力を授かるべき者よ、我が前に――
Translation:
-- well,
O thou who shouldst be given power, before me--

Source string: 沈黙こそ我が意力の糧――
Translation: Silence is the food of my willpower.

Source string: 語るべき言葉――今はない
Translation: Words to say--not now.

Source string:
波を感じる――
はるか遠く、地平の彼方――
Translation:
Feel the waves--
far, far beyond the horizon--

Source string: 真に強き魂あらば、闇は消え去る――
Translation: When the soul is truly strong, the darkness will disappear.

Source string: 覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
Translation: The mission of the enlightened, don't ever forget it.

Source string: 惑いし者よ、畏れずに眼（まなこ）を開け
Translation: Open your eyes without fear, you who are perplexed

Source string: 義なき怒りは、身を滅ぼす――
Translation: Anger without righteousness destroys--

Source string:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
Translation:
Train yourselves.
You are the blade without a blade - sharpen it, or it will decay.

Source string: ――いましばし――休息を許せ――
Translation: --For now... allow me to rest.

Source string: 全てを見通すことはまだ――できぬか――
Translation: I don't know if you've seen it all yet... or if you haven't.

Source string:
広く伝えよ――
覚者にならんと思う者――我は拒まぬ
Translation:
Spread the word--
Whoever wants to become an enlightened man--I will not reject him.

Source string: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
Translation: Remember--remember--love the age of man.

Source string: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
Translation: Awaken, become the wind and run through the earth - carry my soul!

Source string:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
Translation:
O enlightened one--
Remember where you come from.

Source string: あれから３００年以上の時が過ぎている――
Translation: More than 300 years have passed since then--

Source string:
我にとっても短くはない時間だ
いわんや、人間にとっては――
Translation:
It's not a short time for me either.
For man, so to speak--

Source string: 竜なき世界――
Translation: A world without dragons.

Source string:
このレスタニアを竜なき世界にすることだけは
避けねばならぬ――
Translation:
We must avoid
making this Lestania a world without dragons--

Source string: ――どうした
Translation: --What's the matter with you?

Source string:
――いや、眠っていたわけではない
ただ、時折――意識が失せるのだ
Translation:
-- no, I wasn't asleep
just occasionally -- I'd lose consciousness.

Source string: 覚者よ――何用だ
Translation: Sentient--what do you want?

Source string:
我が加護を、おまえたちの言葉に乗せて
民たちに運ぶのだ
Translation:
Carry my blessings on your words
to your people!

Source string: わたしには休息が必要だ
Translation: I need rest.

Source string:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
Translation:
O Wise One,
be my eyes and ears--please.

Source string:
常ならぬ気配は弱まるどころかさらに強くなる
あの娘が強い気を発してるが
それだけではない――
Translation:
The ever-present presence doesn't weaken, it grows stronger.
That girl is emitting strong chi, but
that's not the only thing--

Source string:
漂う穢れた気は――
魔物どもが発するもののようだ
Translation:
The unclean air in the air--
seems to be emanating from the demons.

Source string:
異国の娘から目を離すな――
罪はなくとも、災いを呼び寄せるのはあの娘だ
Translation:
Keep an eye on the exotic girl--
She may be innocent, but she's the one who brings disaster.

Source string: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
Translation: The plague of black armor--it's nasty.

Source string:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
Translation:
Awake,
the unstable minds of young humans--.

Source string:
その掌握は我が手に余る
目を離すなよ
Translation:
Its out of my control
Keep an eye on it.

Source string:
ふむ――
我が力、自覚以上に失われているようだ
Translation:
Hmmm--
My power, I seem to have lost more than I realize.

Source string:
しばし眠るが――
まどろみの中でも、気の変化はわかる
――案ずることはない
Translation:
Sleep for a while, but--
even in slumber, you can tell when your chi is changing
-- don't be alarmed

Source string:
去った者のことは忘れることだ
頼りたいと思った時――
おまえの負けが決まるだろう
Translation:
Forget about the ones who left.
When you want to rely on them--
you will lose.

Source string:
目下の敵の向こうに真の敵がいるはずだ
その姿を見逃すでないぞ
Translation:
Beyond the enemy at hand, there must be a true enemy.
Don't miss that sight.

Source string:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
Translation:
Sentient One--
Travel to Lestania and help your people.
Spread my blessings far and wide.

Source string:
悪意は消えぬ――
そこかしこの闇に潜む黒き悪意――
Translation:
The malice will not go away--
The black malice that lurks in the darkness there and everywhere--

Source string:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
Translation:
Awaken--
Stare into the darkness of your own--

Source string:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
Translation:
O wise man--
hasten the matter--
the evil spirit grows stronger by the day--

Source string:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
Translation:
The evil spirit seems to have faded a bit
Funny--
No, I wonder if he's trying to hold his breath--

Source string:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
Translation:
The flow of evil chi--
I wish you could feel it too

Source string:
後悔の渦に足を取られるな
前を見た者だけが川を渡ることができるのだ
Translation:
Don't let your feet get caught in a whirlpool of regret
Only those who look ahead can cross the river.

Source string:
ふん――
レオめ――
Translation:
Hmph--
Leo me--

Source string: ふむ――いいだろう――
Translation: Hmmm--okay--something to think about.

Source string:
セシリーは覚者ではあるが
未だ途上の覚者――
我が覚者よ――その原因を探すのだ
Translation:
Cecily is an enlightened person, but
an enlightened person who is still a work in progress--
my enlightened person-- look for the cause.

Source string:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
Translation:
O Sentient One--
My power, it cannot reach outside of Lestania
Let earth and man be your allies and your strength!

Source string:
フィンダムの竜への敬意――
けして忘れてはならぬ
Translation:
Findom's respect for dragons--
must never be forgotten!

Source string:
敵意――悪意――我ら竜が最も鋭敏に
感じる意識だ
Translation:
Hostility--malice--is the consciousness that we dragons are most acutely
aware of.

Source string: ふむ――異郷の匂いがするぞ
Translation: Hmmm--it smells foreign.

Source string:
竜を救え――
竜だけが我々に真実を語ることができるだろう
Translation:
Save the dragon--
Only the dragon will be able to tell us the truth.

Source string:
異変の原因は大地の病か――
ふむ――
覚者たちよ――これは根深いぞ――
Translation:
Is the cause of the anomaly a disease of the earth--
hmm--
hmmm-- , wise men-- this is deep-rooted...

Source string: 《原始の雫》――はて、知らぬわ
Translation: I don't know.

Source string:
竜と大地と民――
崩れた均衡を調和の中に戻すのは
難しい――心して、事に当たれ
Translation:
The Dragon, the Earth, and the People--
It's hard
to bring a broken equilibrium back into harmony-- take heart and get on with things!

Source string: 人は竜と大地の下僕のように思えるかもしれない
Translation: One may seem like a servant of the dragon and the earth

Source string:
しかし、覚者よ――学ぶがよい
人の思いは、時に、竜をも狂わせるのだ
Translation:
But, wise one--learn
that sometimes a man's thoughts can drive even a dragon mad!

Source string: （目を閉じ、何かを考えているようだ）
Translation: (Closes his eyes, seems to be thinking about something)

Source string:
フィンダムの竜を見よ
意識が途切れ――乱れているようだ
Translation:
Behold the dragon of Findom:
His consciousness is broken--he seems disoriented.

Source string:
竜に意識を向けろ
一時たりとも忘れるな
Translation:
Be aware of the dragon.
Don't forget, not even for a moment.

Source string:
精霊竜は己を知っている
それ故、セシリーをここへ送り込んだのだ
――判断の正しさを見せてやれ
Translation:
The spirit dragons know who they are
that's why they sent Cecily here
--show them the rightness of their judgment.

Source string:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
Translation: The world out of reason will now return to reason

Source string:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
Translation:
A fireball in the sky like never before...
The very foundation of reason is being shaken...

Source string:
理の揺らぎを感じる――
何が起こるというのか――
Translation:
I feel a shifting of reason--
What is going to happen--?

Source string:
ふむ――匂いが変わったな
彼の地の竜力は焼けた匂いがする
Translation:
Hmmm--the smell has changed.
The dragon power in his land smells like it's been burned.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の気配はないか――
気の乱れを見逃すなよ
Translation: No sign of the evil dragon...

Source string:
王子は、黒い竜に倒されたとする火竜と
如何ほどの時を過ごしたのだろうか――
Translation:
How long did the prince spend
with the fire dragon that he claimed was slain by the black dragon?

Source string: “悪しき竜”からの接触はないのか？
Translation: No contact from the "evil dragon"?

Source string:
アッカーシェランの習わしでは
王子が竜を継ぐはずだ
Translation:
According to Ackershelan custom,
the prince should inherit the dragon.

Source string:
おまえが“悪しき竜”ならどうする
野放しにしておくだろうか――
Translation:
What would you do if you were an "evil dragon"
and you let it run wild?

Source string:
アッカーシェランの幼き覚者を守り
覚者の道を教えられるのは
おまえたちの他にはいない
Translation:
There is no one but you
who can protect the young sentient beings of Acker Sheran and teach them the ways of the
sentient beings.

Source string: “悪しき竜”の目的が見えぬ
Translation: I don't see the purpose of the "evil dragon."

Source string:
よもやとは思うが――
ネド王子の言動に気をつけるがよい
Translation:
I'm sure you're not surprised--
Be careful what Prince Ned says and does.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が竜力を手放すとは思えん
となれば力尽くで奪うことになるのだろうか
果たして可能だろうか――
Translation:
I don't think the "evil dragon" will give up his dragon power.
Then, will we have to take it by force?
Is it really possible?

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が持つ竜力の行方が
アッカーシェランの未来を決めることに
なるだろう
Translation:
The future of the dragon power of the "evil dragon" will determine the future of
Acker Sheran.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の思惑がどうであれ
その竜力はネド王子が継承可能となれば
目指す道はひとつだな
Translation:
Whatever the intentions of the "evil dragon"
, if that dragon power can be inherited by Prince Ned,
there is only one way to go.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
Translation:
The "bad dragon" has a lot of pride.
It's like a human being.
Maybe that's his weakness.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
Translation:
The "bad dragon" has a lot of pride.
It's like a human being.
Maybe that's his weakness.

Source string:
大きな戦いの時は“悪しき竜”の動向に
気を配るのだ
Translation: In times of great battles, watch out for the "evil dragon"

Source string:
おまえたちの勝利は“悪しき竜”の思惑に
どう影響するのか――
Translation: How will your victory affect the evil dragon's agenda

Source string: そろそろ姿を現すかもしれないぞ
Translation: Maybe they'll show up soon.

Source string:
いよいよ“悪しき竜”の本拠を目指すと聞く
気の変化を見逃すなよ
Translation:
I hear you're finally heading to the home of the "evil dragons"
Keep an eye out for changes in the chi...

Source string:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
Translation:
Knights in black armor--
hurry up to find out who they are.

Source string:
そうか――黒い鎧の騎士は
姿を見せぬか
Translation:
Well--the knight in black armor is
nowhere to be seen.

Source string: 竜力を――取り返さねば――
Translation: We must take back the dragon's power.

Source string: 声が――聞こえる――
Translation: I hear... voices...

Source string: ミシアル――
Translation: Misial--

Source string:
あと少し――生かしてくれ――
やり残した――ことが――
Translation:
I need you to let me live a little longer.
I have some unfinished business...

Source string: 我が奪われし竜力はまだか――
Translation: My stolen dragon power is not yet--

Source string: 幸い竜力はすべて戻ったようだ
Translation: Fortunately, all dragon power seems to have returned.

Source string:
我が肉体が潤えばじきに大地も
元に戻るだろう
Translation:
My body will be moistened, and soon the earth
will be restored to its former state.

Source string:
さあ、行くがよい
ここは――わたしはもう大丈夫だ
Translation:
Go on, go
here--I'm all right now.

Source string:
王子の行動は自信と確信に満ちている
そうは思わないか？
Translation:
The Prince's actions are confident and sure
don't you think?

Source string: “悪しき竜”はまだ動かぬか――
Translation: The evil dragon has not yet moved.

Source string:
王子の持つ笛とはいかなる理が
はたらくものなのだろうか――
Translation:
I wonder what kind of reason
works with the flute that the prince has--

Source string:
笛があれば竜に勝てると
王子は信じているようだが――
Translation:
The prince seems to believe
that with a whistle, he can beat the dragon--

Source string:
敵の狙いが見えぬ――
理に傷を付け何を求めるのか――
Translation:
I don't see what the enemy is trying to do--
What do they want that hurts their reason?

Source string:
“悪しき竜”をよく見ておいてくれ
同じことがこの地に起こらないとは
言えないからな
Translation:
Take a good look at the "bad dragon"
because you can't say the same thing won't happen here

Source string:
大切な話がある
心身ともに健やかな時に――頼む
Translation:
I have something important to tell you.
When you are healthy in mind and body--please

Source string:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
Translation:
You don't look well.
Please take care of yourself.

Source string: 白竜様の言葉こそ、導（しるべ）の光――
Translation: The words of Hakuryu-sama are the guiding light.

Source string:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
Translation:
When in doubt, listen to
and let the teachings of Master Hakuryu guide you!

Source string:
心の水面が平らかならば
本来、誰にでも竜の心は伝わるのです
Translation:
If the surface of the heart is level,
essentially everyone can feel the dragon's heart!

Source string:
いまは少し――心持ちが乱れています
お待ちを――
Translation:
I'm a little--mind is a little distracted right now.
Please wait--

Source string:
あなたは覚者です
苦難の道は――避けられません
Translation:
You are an enlightened person.
The path of suffering is--inevitable.

Source string:
人は弱きもの――それゆえ
その力を紡ぎ、束ねんとするのです
Translation:
Man is weak - that's why
he weaves and binds his strength!

Source string:
信じましょう
白竜様の大いなる加護を
Translation:
Let's believe in
the great blessings of the White Dragon.

Source string:
争いのない世を望みながらも、我らの手は
戦の血で汚れていく――虚しきことです
Translation:
We hope for a world without strife, but our hands are stained with the blood of
war - a vain thing!

Source string:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
Translation:
Something to say--something to convey--
The important words are always taught to me by Hakuryu-sama
Yes--not my own words!

Source string: こんにちは、覚者さん
Translation: Hello, Mr. Awakened.

Source string:
おかえりなさい
時に、皆さんとのご挨拶がまだでは？
Translation:
Welcome back to
time to say hello to all of you yet?

Source string: 白竜様が回復される日までともに頑張りましょう
Translation: Let's work together until the day Master Hakuryu recovers.

Source string:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
Translation:
More and more savants are behaving freely, but please keep in mind that
you are only a savant because of Mr. White Dragon

Source string:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
Translation:
I heard you got involved in a dispute between the Knights and the Sentient
I heard you got involved in a dispute between the Knights and the Sentient
Are you okay?

Source string:
いがみ合いが元気の源だという人もいるようですが
わたしにはまったく理解できません――
Translation:
Some people seem to think that bickering is the source of energy.
I don't understand it at all--I've never understood it.

Source string:
アルヴァーには会えましたか？
早く契約までいけると良いですね
Translation:
Did you get to meet Alvar?
I hope you can get to the contract soon.

Source string:
わたしは契約のお手伝いをすることに
なっていますので、その時を楽しみにして
待っていますね
Translation:
I'm supposed to help with the contract
, so I'm looking forward to that time

Source string:
お手伝いできてうれしく思っています
これで押しも押されもせぬ立派な覚者ですね
Translation:
I'm happy to help
Now you're a pushover and a great savant!

Source string:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
Translation:
You've only been an enlightened man for a short time and you're bringing back
the Blood Orb--

Source string:
白竜様がこっそりご加護をくださったのかも
しれませんね
Translation: Maybe the White Dragon has secretly given us a blessing

Source string:
オークの臭いがするなどと騒いだりして
ごめんなさい
あの臭いが恐ろしくてならないのです
Translation:
I'm sorry
for making such a fuss about the smell of oak, etc.
I'm not afraid of that smell!

Source string:
メイリーフの素性を知ったのですか？
あの一族は、今や、このレスタニアの宝石です
Translation:
Have you learned of Mayleaf's true identity?
That family is now the jewel of this Lestania.

Source string:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
Translation:
No wonder the demons are targeting
No wonder
Please, please, please care about them!

Source string:
白竜様の回復は一進一退――
特に石化の症状は油断がなりません
Translation:
Hakuryu-sama's recovery has been a step in the right direction--
Especially the petrification symptoms can be tricky!

Source string: 《ブラッドオーブ》がもっと手に入れば――
Translation: If only I could get more Blood Orbs.

Source string:
イリスの様子はやはり変ですね
わたしが話したがっていると伝えてくれますか？
Translation:
Iris is still acting weird.
Can you tell her I want to talk to her?

Source string:
レオが白竜様を見つめていました
思い詰めているようでしたが――
Translation:
Leo was staring at Master Hakuryu
He seemed to be pondering--

Source string:
大変な戦いだったと聞いています
断ち切られた人生も多かったと――
Translation:
I hear it was a tough fight.
I hear there were a lot of lives cut short--

Source string:
でも、白竜様に捧げられた命は
けして無駄にはなりません
Translation:
But the life dedicated to the White Dragon
will not be wasted!

Source string:
白竜様が空を飛ぶお姿――
いつか見たいものですね
Translation:
I hope to see the White Dragon flying in the sky--
one day!

Source string:
エルフの仲間が面倒を見るということであれば
その方がメイリーフにとっては良いことなのかも
しれませんね――
Translation:
If it means that the elf's friends will be taken care of
maybe that would be better for Mayleaf
--

Source string: イリスは――心配ですね
Translation: Iris--I'm worried.

Source string: 今後もこのようなことが起こるのでしょうか――
Translation: Will this continue to happen in the future--?

Source string:
下の街の皆さんが安心して暮らせるように
どうかよろしくお願いしますね
Translation:
I hope that everyone in the lower city will be able to live in peace at
Please do me a favor.

Source string:
持ち去ったエルフの命――
敵はいったいどうするつもりでしょう
Translation:
Elf lives taken away--
What the hell are our enemies going to do about it?

Source string:
強く、澄み切った命でした
彼の命のあり方は素晴らしい
Translation:
It was a strong, clear life.
The way he lived his life was amazing.

Source string: ――感謝しなくてはなりませんね
Translation: I have to say--thank you for that.

Source string:
白竜様の回復にはまだ時間がかかるようです
これからもわたしたちでお守りしなくては――
Translation:
It will take some time for Master Hakuryu to recover.
We must continue to protect him--

Source string: 無理をきいてくれてありがとうございました
Translation: Thank you for taking on the impossible.

Source string:
少し、甘えてしまったかもしれません
これからは気をつけますね
Translation:
I may have spoiled it a little
I'll be careful from now on.

Source string: イリスのことを聞きましたが――
Translation: I heard about Iris--

Source string:
もう、昔のようには戻れないのですか？
あなたはどんな印象を受けましたか？
Translation:
Can we go back to the way things used to be?
What impression did you get?

Source string: 敵はディアマンテス――
Translation: The enemy is Diamantes--

Source string:
オークの時のようにうまく想像できませんが
でも、白竜様が強い憎しみの気を放っている――
それだけはわかるのです
Translation:
I can't imagine it as well as I did with the orcs
but I know that Master White Dragon is radiating a strong qi of hatred--
that much I know!

Source string:
ああ、ごめん
今は特に話すことはないよ
Translation:
Oh, sorry
I don't really have anything to tell you right now.

Source string:
君と雑談？
いいね！　よし、共通の話題を探そうよ
Translation:
Chatting with you?
Great!　Okay, let's find something we have in common.

Source string:
すまないけど、少し考えたいことがあるんだ
後で話そうよ
Translation:
Sorry, I just have a few things to think about.
We can talk later.

Source string:
おや、疲れたのかい？
覚者も無敵ってわけじゃないんだな
Translation:
Oh, you're tired, aren't you?
I guess even the enlightened aren't invincible.

Source string:
適材適所って言うだろ？
そう、僕は武ではなく、知で攻めるのさ
Translation:
You know what they say about the right person for the right job?
Yes, I attack with knowledge, not military prowess.

Source string:
常識にとらわれないこと
それが、平凡を非凡に変えるんだ
Translation:
Be outside the box.
That's what turns the ordinary into the extraordinary.

Source string:
不安と期待が入り交じるこの気持ち――
説明が難しいね
Translation:
This feeling of mixed anxiety and anticipation--
It's hard to explain.

Source string:
まだ読んでいない書物、まだ試していない実験――
心残りがあるうちは、死ねないよ
Translation:
Books you haven't read yet, experiments you haven't tried yet--
You can't die while you have regrets.

Source string:
この世界は好きかい？
僕は好きだよ
知れば知るほど――もっと知りたくなる
Translation:
Do you like this world?
I do.
The more you know-- the more you want to know.

Source string:
思い立ったら、すぐに行動！
待っていても発見は無いからね
Translation:
When you have an idea, act on it immediately!
You won't find anything if you wait.

Source string: ん？　どうしたんだい？
Translation: Hmm?　What's wrong?

Source string:
やあ、新人さん
最初は誰彼かまわず顔を売っておくといいよ
Translation:
Hey there, newbies.
You should sell your face to anyone and everyone at first.

Source string:
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
常に気にしておくといいよ
見つけると確実に一目置かれるからね
Translation:
You should always keep an eye out for the "Blood Orb" at

because you'll certainly get a look at it when you find it.

Source string:
覚者と騎士団の反目に巻き込まれて
僕は処世術を学んだんだ
Translation:
Caught in the middle of the feud between the Sentient and the Knights
I've learned to get along.

Source string:
――と前向きに考えることにするよ
これも処世術と言えないこともないね
Translation:
--I'm going to try to think positively
and this is another way to get by, I guess.

Source string:
――！？　ああ、ごめんごめん
ちょっと考え事をね
Translation:
--!　Oh, sorry, sorry.
Just a thought.

Source string:
ジョゼフ様の助手になって以来初めての
大仕事を仰せつかって、その計画をね――
ふふふ――
Translation:
I've been asked to do my first big job since I became Joseph's assistant
and I'm planning to--
Hmmm...

Source string: 空から降ってきた巨大な石碑――
Translation: Huge stone monuments that fell from the sky--

Source string:
まだ正体はわからないんだけど
どこかに落ちたらしいんだ
うわさか何か聞いてないかい？
Translation:
I don't know who it is yet, but
I heard it fell somewhere
Have you heard any rumors?

Source string:
反省しています――はい
ああ、君か――また叱られるのかと思ったよ
Translation:
I'm sorry--yes
Oh, you--I thought you were going to scold me again.

Source string:
いや、君にも心配かけたよね
迎えに来てくれてありがとう
本当に感謝しているよ
Translation:
No, you had me worried too
Thanks for picking me up
I really appreciate it!

Source string:
ごめん！
アークの調査報告が最優先でね
あちこち気が回らないんだよ
Translation:
Sorry!
Arc's research report is my top priority.
I just can't be distracted here and there.

Source string:
アーク調査の報告書がまだだというのに
古文書の解読まで――
Translation:
The ARC survey report is not ready yet.
Even the deciphering of ancient documents--

Source string:
でも、君が持ち帰った古文書は面白そうで――
まずいな――ジョゼフ様に叱られるよ
Translation:
But that old document you brought back looks interesting--
That's not good--Master Joseph will scold me!

Source string:
イリスとは話したかい？
なんだか避けられているような気が
しないでもないんだけど――
Translation:
Have you talked to Iris?
I have a feeling he's been avoiding me
, but--

Source string:
もしかしたら、僕が覚者の力に
なれるのかもしれないな――
Translation: Maybe I can be the one to help

Source string:
いささか――怖いね
でも、ほら、白竜様がお待ちだよ
Translation:
It's somewhat--scary.
But, you see, the White Dragon is waiting for you.

Source string:
どうだい？
覚者の生活には慣れたかな？
Translation:
How are you doing?
Are you getting used to the life of the enlightened?

Source string:
ちょうど君が覚者になった頃からこれまでとは
少し違う事件が起こるようになってきた
オークの活動が活発になったり――
ほら、アークの出現もそうだね
Translation:
Just about the time you became an enlightened person, things started happening
a little differently than they have in the past,
orc activity increased--
and, you know, the appearance of the Ark.

Source string:
そして、白竜様の回復を促す新しい方法も
見つかったみたいだ
これからも、もっと色々なことが
起こりそうな気がするよ
Translation:
And it looks like we've found a new way
to help Master Hakuryu recover
I have a feeling more things are going to happen
in the future!

Source string:
メイリーフを連れ出したフードの女って
やっぱり彼女だよな――
Translation:
The woman in the hood who took Mayleaf out is
I knew it was her--

Source string:
ディアマンテス――
イリスは確かにそう言ってたよね？
Translation:
Diamantes--
Iris sure said that, didn't she?

Source string:
あははは――
こんなに神殿の近くが戦場になるなんて――
ああ、怖かった
Translation:
Ha ha ha--
I never thought such a close proximity to the temple would be a battlefield--
Oh, it was scary!

Source string:
さびしいね――
仲良くなれそうな気がしたんだけど――
いや、仲良かったよね――
Translation:
Rusty--
I thought we could get along--
No, we got along--

Source string:
命は白竜様の役に立ったとしても
キースヒルトが知っていた知識、知恵――
全部消えてしまった
Translation:
Even if the life was useful to Master White Dragon,
the knowledge, the wisdom that Keith Hilt knew--
it's all gone.

Source string:
やっぱり僕は生きているキースヒルトと
もっと話したかったよ――
Translation:
I knew I wanted to talk more with Keith Hilt, who is still alive and
--

Source string:
会議だなんて――
これは時間がかかるよ
Translation:
I can't believe we're having a meeting--
This is going to take a while.

Source string:
そんなことしている場合じゃないと思うけど
時間をもらえるのはありがたいことだから
僕は僕で独自に調べようと思っている
Translation:
I don't think I have time for that, but
I'm grateful for the time you give me
I'm going to do my own independent research on my own.

Source string:
まだ読み切れていない古文書もあるし
ここまで実際に体験したことを
評価し直す必要があるかもしれない
Translation:
There are some ancient documents that I haven't read through yet
and I may need to re-evaluate
what I've actually experienced so far.

Source string:
僕も調査に行きたいんだよね――
でもここで騒ぐと余計に面倒な立場に
なってしまいそうだから我慢しているんだ
Translation:
I want to go investigate too--
but I'm holding back because making a fuss here might put me in an even more troublesome position

Source string:
おかしいよ――
第一のアークの調査は僕が担当したんだ
Translation:
Funny--
I was in charge of investigating the first arc.

Source string:
今度の調査だって僕が行けば前回との
比較ができたのに――
意見も全然聞いてもらえないし――はぁ
Translation:
Even the upcoming survey could have been
compared to the last one if I had been there--
and they didn't listen to my opinion at all-- haha!

Source string:
僕は確かに錬金術師の末裔さ
でも、だからなんだと言うんだろうね
Translation:
I am indeed descended from an alchemist
but so what?

Source string:
僕のことはジョゼフ様が一番よく知っている
はずなのに――
Translation:
You know me best, Mr. Joseph.
should know me best...

Source string:
気づいていたのに――
イリスは少し変わったなって
気づいていたんだ
Translation:
I had noticed--
that Iris had changed a little

Source string:
それなのに僕は――
悔やんでも悔やみきれないよ
Translation:
And yet I--
can't regret it enough!

Source string:
僕はね――もう後悔はしたくない
予兆には気づいていたのに――
遠慮する必要は何もなかったのに――
Translation:
I don't--I don't want to have any more regrets
even though I was aware of the signs--
even though I didn't have to hold back-- even though I didn't have anything to hold back--

Source string:
もう友達をなくすのは絶対に嫌だから
思ったことは口にするつもりだよ
Translation:
I'm definitely not going to lose any more friends, so
I'm going to say what I think.

Source string:
ここでジッとしてはいられない
僕もメルゴダへ行く！　絶対行く！
Translation:
I can't sit here
I'm going to Melgoda too!　I'm definitely going!

Source string:
ディアマンテスに対抗する錬金術師が
ちゃんといたことがうれしくてね
Translation:
I'm just glad that there was an alchemist
properly to counter Diamantes.

Source string:
だから僕は、こっち側の人たちと神殿の
架け橋になろうと思うんだ
Translation:
So I'm trying to be a
bridge between the people on this side and the temple.

Source string:
君も協力してくれるよね？
もう結構長い付き合いだもの――
僕に野心がないことなんてわかってるだろ？
Translation:
You'll help me, won't you?
We've known each other for quite a while now--
You know I have no ambition, right?

Source string: 時は来た――だね
Translation: The time has come--right?

Source string:
ずっと考えているんだけど――
ディアマンテスは僕が跡を継ぎたがるって
本気で考えたのかな――
Translation:
I keep thinking--
that Diamantes wants me to follow in his footsteps.
Did he really think--?

Source string:
だとしたら、哀れだね
出会ったばかりの僕しか後継者候補は
いないのか――ってさ
Translation:
If so, it's pathetic
I just met you and I'm the only potential successor

Source string:
嵐の中を出かけていった騎士たちには
頭が下がるよ
Translation: I bow down to the knights who went out in the storm at

Source string:
次は覚者の番だね
くれぐれも、気をつけて
Translation:
I guess it's the waker's turn next.
Take care, take care.

Source string:
悪いね
ついついレオのことを考えてしまうんだ
こんな時にどうして留守なんだってね
Translation:
Sorry
I can't stop thinking about Leo
why he's away at a time like this.

Source string:
他の人も思いは同じだと思うよ
つまり――
僕が言いたいのは、レオの後任は大変だけど
頑張ってくれってことさ
Translation:
I'm sure others have the same thoughts.
I mean--
I mean-- I know it's tough to replace Leo, but I just want to say
good luck!

Source string:
問題は、君とガルドリンが行ったという
島の場所だね
Translation:
The problem is the location of the
island you and Galdrin say you went to.

Source string:
レスタニア中の海図がこの神殿に
集まることになっているんだ
船乗りたちと一緒に、その海図とにらめっこさ
Translation:
The charts of all of Lestania are to be gathered in this temple

and I'll be staring at them with the sailors.

Source string:
大海原に浮かぶ島を見つけるなんて
そう簡単じゃない
Translation: It's not so easy to find an island in the ocean

Source string:
覚悟はしていたけどね――
いやいや、挫けてなるものか！
Translation:
I was prepared for this --
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!

Source string:
島が見つかってホッとしているよ
肩の荷が下りたというかね
ここだけの話――
ジョゼフ様は僕を試しているね
Translation:
I'm relieved to have found the island
It's a weight off my shoulders
Between you and me--
Master Joseph is testing me.

Source string:
将来の神官にふさわしいかどうか――
ノドから手が出るほど欲しい地位だったけど
今はどうかな――
Translation:
I don't know if I'm worthy of being a future priest--
It was a position I wanted with my hands in my throats, but
I don't know if I want it now--

Source string:
逐次攻略というか各個撃破というか
物事はひとつずつ解決するのが良策だと
主張する人もいるけどね――
Translation:
I'm not sure if it's a sequential strategy or individual attacks.
Some people argue that it's a good idea to solve things one at a time.
Some people argue that it's a good idea to solve things one at a time-- but I'm not sure that it's a good idea.

Source string:
僕は混乱の中で解決を模索するのが好きなんだ
つまり、この慌ただしさも僕の味方さ
Translation:
I like to seek solutions in the midst of chaos
I mean, this flurry of activity is on my side too.

Source string:
島の調査は引き続きやっているよ
いい報告ができればいいんだけど
少々魔物が多くてね
Translation:
We're still working on the island survey
Hopefully we'll have a good report
It's been a little demonic.

Source string:
騎士団が時々掃討作戦を展開しているから
まあ、気長にね――
ああ気長！　僕たちの苦手なやつだよね
くう――
Translation:
Because the Knights sometimes conduct sweeps
Well, be patient--
Oh, patient!　We're not very good at that.
Kuu--

Source string:
レオが匿っているという人と話せれば
もっと色々と分かるのだろうけど
今はそれよりも侵食魔退治だね
まったく、次から次へと――
Translation:
If I could talk to the person Leo says he's hiding
I'm sure I'd know a lot more, but
Right now it's more about killing the invaders
Indeed, one thing after another--

Source string:
例の島をね、もっとよく調べようと思うんだ
戦いは一段落ついたのかもしれないけど
調査は何も終わってないからね
Translation:
I'm going to look into that island more closely.
The fight may be over, but
the investigation is anything but over.

Source string:
僕も島に乗り込みたいと思っていたけど
まだ時期尚早のようだね
もう少し状況が落ち着くのを待つよ
Translation:
I was hoping to get on the island too
but it looks like it's too early to tell
I'll wait for things to calm down a bit more.

Source string:
島に現れた魔物はこれまでの侵食魔とは
かなり様子が違うとか？
Translation:
I hear that the demons that appeared on the island are very different from the previous invasive demons
?

Source string:
黒騎士と魔物の関係という観点から見ると
新手の方が、より黒騎士に近い存在という
ことかなあ
Translation:
In terms of the relationship between the black knight and the demon
I guess that means that the new hand is closer to the black knight

Source string:
ロイグが早くよくなることを祈るよ
まあ、ロイグのためというよりは
かなり利己的な理由だけどね
Translation:
I hope Roig gets better soon
Well, not so much for Roig's sake
but for pretty selfish reasons.

Source string:
あやふやとはいえ、ロイグの方が色々と
覚えているからね
その情報だけでも、ありがたいと思わなくちゃ
Translation:
Even though it's iffy, I remember a lot more
than Roig does.
I should be thankful for that information alone!

Source string:
セシリーは深手を負っている
致命傷がなければ命は助かるだろうけど
回復には長い時間がかかるよ
Translation:
Cecily is deeply wounded
and if she's not fatally injured, she'll probably live.
It's going to take her a long time to recover.

Source string: まあ、今は生きのびてくれることを祈ろう
Translation: Well, let's hope he survives for now.

Source string:
悔しいなあ
僕には知らないことがいっぱいある
それを思い知らされて――
ああ、悔しいよ
Translation:
It's frustrating
There's so much I don't know
I'm reminded of that--
Oh, it's frustrating!

Source string:
僕は君たちの一歩先のことを考えるとしよう
それが僕の仕事だよね？
Translation:
Let's say I'm one step ahead of you guys
That's my job, right?

Source string:
あのゲートはフィンダムの竜の力が
生み出したものだ
僕らの心意気だけじゃどうにもならないよ
Translation:
That gate is a product of Findom's dragon power

Our spirit alone won't help.

Source string:
ゲートの継続性について
もう少し確信が得られないと
僕は向こうへは行けないな
Translation:
On gate continuity
I need to be a little more sure
I can't go over there.

Source string: 覚者じゃないこの身が恨めしいよ
Translation: I hate myself for not being an enlightened person.

Source string:
ジョゼフ様の話を聞いていると
まるで僕たちがフィンダムへの侵略者のように
思えてくるよ
Translation:
Listening to Master Joseph,
makes it sound like we're the invaders of Findom

Source string:
向こうとこっち――
立場は五分と五分――この考え方が
平和共存への道に繋がると思うんだ
Translation:
The other side and this side--
stand 50-50--this way of thinking will lead us to
peaceful coexistence.

Source string:
よく考えると、このレスタニアでも
竜の不調は続いているわけだよね
Translation:
If you think about it, even here in Restania,
the dragon's malfunction is still going on.

Source string:
となると、レスタニアの混乱がこの程度で
済んでいるのは、とてつもなく運が
いいのかもしれないね
Translation:
So maybe we're incredibly lucky
that this is the extent of the mess
in Restania!

Source string:
フィンダムを竜力が巡る仕組みは
こっちとは少し違うようだね
Translation: The mechanism of how dragon power travels around Findum is a little different than over here at

Source string:
竜と樹が循環と浄化を分け合っているというか――
竜への異存が少ないということなのかなあ
Translation:
I wonder if the dragon and the tree are sharing the circulation and purification, or--
I wonder if it means that there is less objection to the dragon.

Source string:
聞くところによると、セシリーのお父さんは
戦士でもなんでもない、普通の人らしいね
Translation:
From what I hear, Cecily's dad is
not a warrior or anything, just a regular guy.

Source string:
君だって、不安だろう？
早いところ、行った方がいいよ
Translation:
You're worried, too, aren't you?
You'd better get there as soon as possible.

Source string:
さあ、みんなが待ってるよ？
君がなんとかしてくれる――
そう思っている連中も多いはずさ
Translation:
Come on, the guys are waiting for you, okay?
You'll handle it--
I'm sure a lot of them think so.

Source string:
ロイグはガラダ族長たちのことを
快く思っていなかった
いや、逆恨みしていたという感じかな？
Translation:
Loig was not
comfortable with the Galada chiefs
or was it more like he resented them?

Source string:
その心の暗い部分に黒騎士が
入り込んだ――か
Translation:
The black knight has entered
into that dark part of your mind--or so it seems.

Source string:
それにしてもあのロイグがね――
心根のいい奴に思えたけどなあ
僕の人を見る目もまだまだだね
Translation:
But then again, that Roig--
seemed like a good guy with a good heart.
I guess I'm still a bit of a judge of character.

Source string:
回り道はあったけど、いよいよだね
良い報告を待っているよ
Translation:
There was a detour, but now it's time.
I'll be waiting for a good report.

Source string:
浄化は始まっているんだろう？
進捗状況が気になるところだね
Translation:
I assume the cleanup has begun?
I'm curious to see the progress.

Source string:
くれぐれも気をつけてくれよ
無事にここへ戻って来ると約束してほしい
君たちは歴史の証言者なんだからね
Translation:
Take care of yourself.
Promise me you'll come back here safe and sound.
You are witnesses to history.

Source string:
これからフィンダムへの渡航者が増えるだろうね
もちろん僕も準備を進めているんだ
Translation:
I'm sure more and more people will be traveling to Findom in the future.
Of course I'm getting ready to do the same.

Source string:
覚者が一緒じゃないと戻ってこられないから
君たち、その時はよろしくたのむよ
Translation:
I can't come back without a savant with me, so
You guys, I'll look forward to working with you then.

Source string:
フィンダムで起こったことを記録して
後世に残そうと思っているんだけど――
Translation:
I'm trying to document what happened in Findom for posterity at
--

Source string: また何か起こりそうな気配だね
Translation: Looks like something else is about to happen.

Source string:
アッカーシェランか
自然環境はこっちとほぼ同じなんだね
つまり、理と竜の世界ということか
Translation:
Acker Sheran.
The natural environment is almost the same as here.
So it's a world of reason and dragons.

Source string:
アッカーシェランの状況は良くないみたいだけど
それでも君たちはレスタニアの代表なんだ
Translation:
I know the situation in Ackercheran doesn't look good
but still, you guys represent Lestania.

Source string: 可能な限り、いい顔でたのむよ
Translation: I'll try to look as good as possible.

Source string: とにもかくにも今はネド王子だね
Translation: Anyway, you're Prince Ned now.

Source string:
解放軍はここに来てずいぶん敵を
刺激したからね
反撃は覚悟しないと
Translation:
The Liberation Army has provoked the enemy
enough to come here.
We must be prepared for a counterattack.

Source string:
盗賊と言えば荒くれ者と相場が決まっている
本拠地に乗り込むんだから
言動には気をつけて
Translation:
Thieves are quoted as being rough and tumble.
You're going to be riding into the main base.
Be careful what you say and do.

Source string: ガルドリンには特に強く言っておかないと
Translation: I have to say this especially strongly for Gardolyn.

Source string:
盗賊の次はオークの本拠地だって？
君たちはそっちの方が慣れているかな
Translation:
After the bandits, now the orcs have their own stronghold?
I wonder if you guys are more used to that.

Source string:
ネド王子と解放軍が合流したんだ
敵の警戒も厳しくなるだろうね
Translation:
Prince Ned and the Liberation Army have joined forces.
I'm sure the enemy will be very vigilant.

Source string:
アッカーシェランで“悪しき竜”との
全面戦争が始まるのかな
Translation:
I wonder if the
all-out war against the "evil dragon" will start in Acker Sheran.

Source string:
アッカーシェランとも、フィンダムのような
友好的な関係になれるといいね
Translation:
I hope you can be as
friendly with Acker Sheran as you are with Findom.

Source string:
アッカーシェランに灯った希望の火を
消してはいけないよ
Translation:
Don't let
extinguish the fire of hope lit in Acker Sheran!

Source string:
君たち自身も希望なんだ
それを忘れないでくれ
Translation:
You are your own hope.
Don't forget that.

Source string:
ひとつだけわかったのは――
“悪しき竜”はすぐに君たちを亡き者に
するつもりはないということ
Translation:
One thing I do know--
the "evil dragon" isn't going to make you guys dead
anytime soon!

Source string: これは悪くない事だと思うよ
Translation: I think this isn't a bad thing.

Source string:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
Translation:
Now Master Joseph is a sceptic.
Don't be surprised what he says.

Source string:
今のジョゼフ様は猜疑心の塊だよ
何を言い出しても驚かないことだね
Translation:
Now Master Joseph is a sceptic.
Don't be surprised what he says.

Source string: 本格的な城攻めを前にしての休暇かな？
Translation: Is this a vacation before a full-scale castle siege?

Source string:
レスタニアは平和なものさ
気分転換に散歩でもどうだい？
Translation:
Lestania is a peaceful place.
How about a walk for a change?

Source string:
奪回した城を拠点に力を蓄えて
“悪しき竜”の討伐を目指すのだよね？
Translation:
We will use the castle we have taken as a base to build up our strength and
aim to defeat the "evil dragon", right?

Source string:
道のりはまだまだありそうだから
じっくり行かないとね
Translation:
There's still a ways to go, so
we'll have to take our time.

Source string:
今朝、ぶつけて爪が欠けてしまってね
嫌な予感がするんだ
Translation:
I bumped it this morning and chipped a nail.
I have a bad feeling about this.

Source string:
謎の騎士の話題で持ちきりだね
正体はどうあれ、強敵に違いないから
万事準備怠りなく、だよ？
Translation:
There's a lot of talk about the mysterious knight.
Whatever his identity, he must be a formidable foe, so
be prepared for anything, okay?

Source string:
王都の戦いが終わらないと
落ち着かないよね
Translation:
I'm not going to
calm down until the battle for King's Landing is over.

Source string:
今は解放軍と一緒に王都奪回の戦いに
専念するのがいいと思うよ
Translation:
I think it's a good idea to concentrate
on the battle to retake King's Landing with the Liberation Army for now.

Source string:
考え得る対策を書きだして
とにかく吟味する
Translation:
Write down possible measures and
examine them anyway.

Source string:
そして、良さそうなのがあれば
君たちにも伝えるからね
Translation: And if it looks good, I'll tell you guys at

Source string:
あれこれ書物に当たっているけど
こんな危機はかつてなくて
白竜様と僕たちが初めてのようだ
Translation:
I've been hitting the books on this and that
but there's never been a crisis like this
and it looks like we're the first, Mr. White Dragon and us.

Source string:
頼むよ――
黒騎士の剣を取り戻して
Translation:
Please--
bring back the Black Knight's sword.

Source string: さあ、急いで
Translation: Come on, hurry up.

Source string:
君たちを助けるセシリーの竜力は
あくまでも仮初めの力
そう長くは続かないと思うよ
Translation:
Cecily's dragon power to help you guys
is only temporary
I don't think it will last that long.

Source string:
レスタニアの命運は尽きる寸前だった――
あはは――今になって脚が震えるよ
Translation:
Lestania's fate was on the verge of running out--
Haha--now I'm shaking in my legs!

Source string:
ネド王子はたしかにまだ子供だけど
聞く限り、無茶はしない印象だよ
Translation:
Prince Ned is indeed still a child, but from what I've
heard, I get the impression he's not reckless.

Source string:
姿を消したとなると、何か深い事情が
あるんだろうね
解決可能なことだといいけど――
Translation:
If he's disappeared, there must be something deeper at

I hope it's something that's solvable--I'm sure it's not.

Source string:
ジョゼフ様がまたなんか言ってるだろ？
人を疑うのが性分なんだね
Translation:
Master Joseph is saying something again, isn't he?
It's in your nature to doubt people, isn't it?

Source string:
これは王子なりによく考えた末の
行動だと思うよ
そうじゃないと、君たちから聞いていた
王子の印象と合わないからね
Translation:
I think this is a well thought out
action in the prince's own way
otherwise it wouldn't fit the
impression I've heard from you guys of the prince.

Source string: 王子には何か目的があるのだろうけど――
Translation: I'm sure the prince has a purpose, but--

Source string:
その目的を果たしたあとは
どんな顔をして仲間のところへ戻る気で
いるんだろうね
あまり考えていないのかな
Translation:
I wonder what
you're going to look like
once you've served that purpose and are ready to go back to your friends
I wonder if you're thinking about it too much.

Source string: 火垂れ山は“悪しき竜”の住み処だよね
Translation: Mt. Hidareyama is the home of the "evil dragon."

Source string:
いつ襲撃されてもおかしくないから
四方八方、気を抜かないようにね
Translation:
You could be attacked at any time, so
stay on your toes on all sides.

Source string: 行ったり来たり、ご苦労だね
Translation: Back and forth, back and forth... I'm sorry you're having a hard time.

Source string:
以前はうらやましいと思ったけど
最近は――ああ、僕も歳を取ったのかな
Translation:
I used to be envious of you
but lately--oh, I must be getting old.

Source string:
早くアッカーシェランへ向かった方がいいよ
状況は王子の動き次第で変わるんだから
Translation:
You'd better head to Acker Sheran as soon as possible.
The situation depends on the prince's moves.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”は力だけを与えられた子供――
そんなふうに考えられないかな？
Translation:
The "bad dragon" is a child who has been given only power -
Can't you think of it that way?

Source string:
力だけで知識も経験も与えられなかったから
釣り合いが取れなくて――
いやいや、問題はそこじゃないか！
Translation:
Because I was given only power and no knowledge or experience
I couldn't balance--
No, no, no, no, that's not the problem!

Source string:
誰が与えたか――与えなかったのか――
考えるべきなのは背後にいたのは
誰かって話だよね
Translation:
Who gave -- or didn't give --
What we should be thinking about is who was behind

Source string: 何か心配事でも？
Translation: What's worrying you?

Source string:
気になることがあるのなら
さっさと解決しておくことを薦めるよ
Translation:
If you've got something on your mind, I suggest you go to
and get it sorted out quickly.

Source string:
おまえたち覚者の力こそ
我々に残された希望だ
Translation: The power of you sentient beings is the only hope we have left

Source string:
ふむ、年かな――
話したいことがあったはずだが、忘れてしまったよ
Translation:
Hmm, I guess I'm old--
I'm sure there was something I wanted to tell you, but I forgot!

Source string:
白竜の意思を完全に理解することは難しい
たとえ巫女でもな
Translation:
It's hard to fully understand the will of the white dragon
even if you're a priestess.

Source string:
我々は常に己を律し、不測の事態に備えねばならん
わかってはいるが――なかなか、なぁ
Translation:
We must always discipline ourselves and be prepared for the unexpected.
I know - but it's not easy.

Source string:
覚者よ、頼んだぞ
おまえたちの働きが大勢を決める
Translation:
I'm asking you, wise men.
Your work will determine the outcome.

Source string:
竜の意志を紡ぐこと
それが我らを災いから救うのだ
Translation:
Weaving the will of the dragon
that will save us from disaster.

Source string:
どうした、不安なことがあるのか？
まず、おまえたちが落ち着かなくては
Translation:
What's the matter? Are you worried about something?
First of all, you need to calm down.

Source string:
悠々と、ただそこにある世界を前に――
我々はなんと小さく、稚拙な存在なのだろうな
Translation:
In the face of a world that is just there, leisurely--
What a small, poor existence we are!

Source string:
わしほどの激動を生きた神官はいないだろうが
はて、喜ぶべきか嘆くべきか――
Translation:
No priest has lived through as much upheaval as I have.
But, should I rejoice or mourn--?

Source string:
日がな一日ここに立ち、竜を思い、政を思う
おまえたちを思う時間はほとんどないが、まあ許せ
Translation:
I stand here all day long, thinking about dragons and politics
I don't have much time to think about you guys, but forgive me.

Source string: 理の外の世界――
Translation: The world outside of reason--

Source string:
そんな世界があるとして、そこでは
どんな道理がはたらくのか――想像もつかんわ
Translation:
If there is such a world,
I can't imagine what kind of reasoning would work there--I can't imagine it!

Source string:
ああ、すまない
考えごとをしていてな
Translation:
Yeah, sorry,
I've been doing some thinking.

Source string:
オーク臭いようだな
神殿では気をつけた方がいい
Translation:
Sounds like you smell like orc.
You better watch out in the temple.

Source string: 時間を見つけて外へ出てみるんだな
Translation: You've got to find time to get out there.

Source string:
覚者を育てるのは、結局のところ経験だ
いや、これは覚者に限らないがな
Translation:
It's experience, after all, that makes a savant
No, this isn't limited to savants.

Source string:
近々、ある調査団を派遣することになってな
その人選で、いささか多忙だ
Translation:
I'm sending a survey team soon
and I'm somewhat busy with the selection process.

Source string:
ポーンとの契約は進んでいるか？
終わればいよいよ一人前の覚者だな
Translation:
How's the deal with the pawns coming along?
When you're done, you'll be a full-fledged enlightened man.

Source string:
ふむ――
順調に覚者としての階段を登っているようだな
頼もしいことだ
Translation:
Hmmm--
You seem to be climbing the steps to being a savant
I'm encouraged by that.

Source string: 砦との往復は何度目だ？
Translation: How many times have you been to the fort and back?

Source string:
砦に限らず、あちこち自分の足で
行ってみることが大切だ
地図を眺めていても頭に入らんだろうからな
Translation:
It's important to go there
with your own feet, not only to the fort
because you won't get it in your head by looking at a map.

Source string:
次から次へと――どうしてくれようか
オークどもの対処だけでも大変なのに
今度はアークだと？
Translation:
One after another--what are we to do?
It's hard enough just dealing with the orcs
And now ARC?

Source string:
おまえも忙しくなるだろうから休める時には
休んでおくことだ
Translation:
You'll be busy too, so when you can take a break,
take it.

Source string:
メイリーフの正体は他言無用
約束だからな
Translation:
Don't tell anyone else who Mayleaf is.
I promise.

Source string:
どこかへ行っていたのか？
ふむ――これは隠し事の臭いだな
Translation:
Where have you been?
Hmmm--this smells like something hidden.

Source string: イリスは本当に大丈夫なのか？
Translation: Is Iris really okay?

Source string:
覚者のことは覚者に任せるしかない
よく見ていてやるんだぞ
Translation:
We'll just have to let the savants take care of the savants.
We'll watch them closely.

Source string: レオが悩んでいるようだが――
Translation: Leo seems to be having trouble--

Source string:
弱っているところをああも露骨に見せるのは
いかがなものかな――
Translation:
How is it
to be so blatant in your weakness--?

Source string:
賛成しかねるが――
無為なことと断じるつもりもない
Translation:
I don't agree with you--
but I'm not going to dismiss it as a waste of time.

Source string:
覚者に力を与えたぶんだけ
白竜自身の回復が遅れる――
そう考えることもできる
Translation:
The more power you give the sentient
, the slower the white dragon's own recovery--
can be thought of that way.

Source string:
覚者の本分は白竜の回復を助けることだ
――ゆめゆめ忘れるなよ
Translation:
The savant's main duty is to help the white dragon recover.
--Don't forget to dream.

Source string:
キースヒルトか――
ここで暮らしてくれれば安心なのだが
あの種族は偏屈だからな――
Translation:
Keith Hilt or--
I'd feel safer if he lived here.
That species is so eccentric--

Source string: イリスを通じて敵を知る――ひとつの方策だ
Translation: Knowing your enemy through iris--that's one way to do it.

Source string:
いや、わたしだって、驚いているし
胸も痛む――
Translation:
No, I'm surprised, too, and
heartbroken--

Source string:
しかし、敵に心奪われた者をこれまでどおり
信頼するわけにもいくまい
Translation:
But we can't continue to trust
those who are enthralled by our enemies as we have in the past.

Source string:
アークを送り込みんできた者の名は――
いや、やめておこう
Translation:
The name of the person who could have sent ARC to--
No, let's not.

Source string:
おかしなものだ――
エルフはメイリーフだけではないと知ってから
心の隅で安心していた部分がある――
Translation:
It's a funny thing--
Since I learned that Mayleaf wasn't the only elf
there was a part of me that was relieved in a corner of my mind--

Source string:
狙われるのはメイリーフだけではない、とな
自分の身勝手さに驚くしかなかったよ
Translation:
It's not just Mayleaf that's being targeted.
I couldn't help but be amazed at my own selfishness.

Source string: 誇り高き孤独な魂――
Translation: Proud, lonely souls--

Source string:
我々で迎えることができてうれしいよ
ああ、これは本心だ
Translation:
Glad to have you with us
Yeah, I mean this.

Source string:
会議に参加したい？
それよりも戦いの準備を進めてくれ
Translation:
Want to attend a meeting?
Better yet, get ready for a fight.

Source string:
どこへ行ってどう戦うべきか――
我々が考えるから、おまえは何も考えずに
戦ってくれればいい
Translation:
Where to go and how to fight--
we'll figure it out, you don't have to think about it
just fight.

Source string:
会議の長さに不満が出ていることは知っている
しかし、事はレスタニアの未来に
大きく影響するだろう
Translation:
I know there have been complaints about the length of the meeting
but the thing is
will have a big impact on the future of Restania

Source string: 慌てて結論に飛びついてはいかんのだ
Translation: We shouldn't jump to conclusions in a hurry.

Source string:
レオはまだか？
今後のこととイリスの処遇を相談せねばならん
見かけたら、すぐここへ来るように言ってくれ
Translation:
Is Leo here yet?
We need to discuss the future and what to do with Iris.
If you see him, tell him to come here right away.

Source string:
アークの攻略方法はわたしにまかせて――
ほら、今のうちに休んでおけ
Translation:
Leave it to me to figure out how to attack the ARC--
Here, get some rest while you can.

Source string:
ミシアルは最近のイリスにまつわる
うわさを知っていた
Translation:
Missial knew about the recent
rumors about Iris.

Source string:
つまり、警戒していたはずだ
それなのに何故――
Translation:
I mean, they should have been warned.
So why--

Source string:
まさかレオまで――
いや、それはあるまい――なあ？
Translation:
No way, not even Leo--
No, that's not-- hey?

Source string:
さあ、メルゴダへ行くんだ
向こうで誰と話――誰と戦うか
それは自分で決めればいい
Translation:
Now, go to Melgoda
and you can decide who you'll talk to--and who you'll fight--on the other side.
You can decide that for yourself.

Source string:
おまえはけして間違えない
ああ、信じているとも
Translation:
You're never wrong.
Oh, I believe you.

Source string:
レオとは会えたか？
わたしが心配していたと伝えてくれ
Translation:
Did you see Leo?
Tell him I was worried.

Source string:
さあ、今のうちに休んだり装備を見直したり――
いよいよ決戦だぞ
Translation:
Now, while you're at it, get some rest and review your equipment--
It's time for the showdown!

Source string: レオの姿が見えないがじきに戻るだろう
Translation: No sign of Leo, but he'll be back soon.

Source string:
白竜様へはおまえから報告するといい
つもる話はそれからでも遅くはない
Translation:
You can report to the White Dragon yourself
It's not too late to start a conversation.

Source string:
これほどの嵐――
史書の編纂が始まって以来なかったことだ
後世のために、詳細な記録を
残しておかねば
Translation:
A storm of this magnitude--
has not been seen since the beginning of the compilation of historical books
We must keep a detailed record
for posterity!

Source string: また落ち着かない日々が始まるようだな
Translation: Looks like another restless day ahead.

Source string:
ガルドリン、リズ、エリオットをうまく使って
この困難を乗り切ってくれ
むろん、わたしにできることはなんでもする
Translation:
Use Galdrin, Liz, and Elliott well
to get us through this difficulty
Of course, I'll do whatever I can to help.

Source string:
何が起こっていようとも
我々が当事者でなければ良いと思っていたが
案の定、焼け石を拾ってしまったようだ
Translation:
Whatever is going on
I was hoping we weren't a party to it
I guess I picked up a burnt stone as I thought I would.

Source string:
見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
Translation:
From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a
maiden with an innocent heart...

Source string:
いったい何故セシリーが狙われねば
ならんのだ
Translation: Why on earth should Cecily be targeted

Source string:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
Translation:
If the Knights and the Sentinels join forces to fight
there is no opponent we can't beat--

Source string:
そう信じているのだが、戦ってばかりでは
事態の把握は不可能
やはり戦力の分割は避けられぬわ
Translation:
I believe so, but if we keep fighting,
we'll never be able to figure out what's going on.
We still can't avoid dividing our forces.

Source string:
問題は幾つもあるが
せめて侵食魔だけでも排除できないものだろうか
そうなれば人員配置が楽になるのだが
Translation:
There are a number of problems.
Can we at least eliminate the Corruption demon?
That would make staffing easier.

Source string: レオは何か言ってこないのか？
Translation: Leo didn't say anything?

Source string:
状況が変われば考え方を変える
その柔軟さが美点だったが――
それすらも変わってしまったのだろうか
Translation:
We change our thinking when circumstances change
That flexibility used to be a virtue--
but I wonder if even that has changed.

Source string:
侵食魔どもめ――
奴らのせいでじっくり考える事もできん
Translation:
Those invaders--
they're the reason I can't even think straight.

Source string:
機先を制するには腰を据えた思索が
不可欠だというのに――
Translation:
While sitting back and contemplating
is essential to get ahead of the curve--

Source string:
そろそろ明るい兆しが見えても良いはずだが――
セシリーには焦るなと言ったものの
一番落ち着くべきなのはわたしかもしれんな
Translation:
There should be a silver lining by now--
Although I told Cecily not to rush
I'm probably the one who needs to calm down the most.

Source string:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
Translation:
How'd it go?
I'm waiting for good news.

Source string:
精神的な強い衝撃が人の記憶を奪うという
話は昔から知られている
Translation:
The
story that a strong mental shock can rob a person of his or her memory has been known for a long time.

Source string: セシリーの場合はどのような事情なのだろうな
Translation: I wonder what the circumstances are in Cecily's case.

Source string:
ロイグの病気がわたしの知るものであれば
相当苦しいはずだ
早く助けてやりたいものだな
Translation:
If Loig's illness is what I know it is
he must be in a lot of pain
I hope I can help him soon.

Source string:
いやはや――
まったく――
Translation:
Oh no--
Not at all--

Source string:
ロイグとセシリーの記憶合わせが
不調に終わってから
嫌な予感しかしないのだ
Translation:
I've had a bad feeling about
since Loig and Cecily's memory match
went poorly.

Source string:
今は――
セシリーを疎ましく思ったことを恥じて
回復を祈るばかりだ
Translation:
Now--
I'm ashamed to have alienated Cecily
and I wish her a speedy recovery.

Source string:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
Translation:
Please,
whatever bond you have with Leo--
or whatever feud you have with him--
your priority right now is to help Cecily.

Source string:
セシリーが一命を取り留めた
憂いがひとつ消えたというわけだ
再び、前へ進もうではないか
Translation:
Cecily survived
So that's one sorrow gone.
Let's move forward again!

Source string:
もし時間があるのなら
たまにでいいから、島の様子を見てくれよ
Translation:
If you have the time,
just check in with me once in a while to see what's going on on the island.

Source string: 異郷の姿、その目でしかと見届けよ
Translation: See with your own eyes what it is like to be in another land.

Source string:
こちらのことは何も心配するな
それから――
フィンダムの住民と接触する時は
威厳を忘れずにな
Translation:
Don't worry about anything over here
and then--
when you make contact with the residents of Findom
remember to be dignified.

Source string:
さあ、早くフィンダムに行ってやれ
無事を信じているとはいえ、ガルドリンの安否も
気になるところだ
Translation:
Come on, get him to Findom as soon as possible.
Even though I believe he's safe, I'm also concerned about Galdrin's safety.

Source string:
フィンダムのことはフィンダムの民たちが
よく知っているだろう
Translation:
The people of Findom will know
well about Findom.

Source string:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
Translation:
Maybe there's a way to solve this, or something.
Ask nicely and help him out.

Source string:
《原始の雫》の到着を座して待つのも
手持ちぶさただろう
さあ、フィンダムへ行って、手伝ってやりなさい
Translation:
You're probably too lazy
to sit and wait for the "primordial drops" to arrive.
Go on, go to Findom and help him out.

Source string:
奪われた《原始の雫》――
多少出過ぎた真似をしてもかまわんから
必ず取り戻すのだぞ
Translation:
The stolen "primordial drops"--
I don't care if I go a little overboard,
you must get them back!

Source string:
セシリーにはよくしてやるのだぞ？
ぜひ、強い友情の絆を結んでくれ
少々の利害の対立などに負けぬ、強い絆を
Translation:
Treat Cecily well, will you?
Please form a strong bond of friendship
that is stronger than the slightest conflict of interest.

Source string:
セシリーは重い責任に押し潰されそうに
なってはいないか？
側にいて、支えてやるといい
Translation:
Isn't Cecily about to be crushed by the heavy responsibility
?
Stay by her side and support her.

Source string:
白竜はフィンダムの精霊竜ウィルミアに
語りかけようとしているがうまくいかないようだ
Translation:
The white dragon is trying
to talk to Wyrmia, the spirit dragon of Fyndham, but it doesn't seem to work.

Source string:
おまえたちも忙しいだろうが
気にしてみてくれ
Translation: I know you guys are busy, but you might want to check out

Source string:
時に、ロイグの行方はまだわからんのか
もしや救いを求めているということはないか？
Translation:
Sometimes, you still don't know where Roig is.
Is it possible that he is looking for salvation?

Source string: 今一度会い、真意を聞いてみたいものだ
Translation: I would like to see him again and hear his true intentions.

Source string:
ロイグのことは聞いた
なんとも無念ではあるが――
Translation:
I heard about Loig
What a shame, but--

Source string:
フィンダムの汚れとともに
あの男の闇も浄化されるだろうよ
Translation:
Along with the dirt on Findom
that man's darkness will be purged.

Source string:
フィンダムの完全な復興には
まだまだ時間がかかるだろう
時々訪ねて、経過を報告しておくれ
Translation:
It will take a long time
to fully restore Findom.
Visit from time to time and keep us posted on your progress.

Source string: これは吉兆だ――良きことが始まる――
Translation: This is a good omen--good things are about to begin.

Source string:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
Translation:
I'm trying to tell myself that
It's not easy to--

Source string:
異郷の地にひとり残るとは
エリオットの評価を改めねばならんな
Translation:
To remain alone in a foreign land,
I'll have to revise my assessment of Elliott.

Source string: 指示や助言をしようにも情報が足りんわ
Translation: I don't have enough information to give you instructions or advice.

Source string:
しばらくは、おまえたちの判断で
臨機応変に対応してくれ
Translation:
For the time being, you guys can use your judgment
and be flexible.

Source string: メイロワ将軍とはうまくやれそうか？
Translation: Do you think you and General Meyerova will get along?

Source string:
まずは王子が戻らないことには
どうにも動きようがないな
Translation:
First of all, if the prince doesn't come back,
there's no way to make a move.

Source string:
聞こえてくる話から想像するに
ネド王子の性根は悪くなさそうだ
友好的な関係を築いてくれよ
Translation:
From the stories I hear, I imagine
Prince Ned's character doesn't sound too bad
I hope you're on friendly terms with him.

Source string:
敵の砦に乗り込むと聞いている
くれぐれも気をつけてな
Translation:
I hear you're going to ride into an enemy stronghold.
Take care.

Source string:
当面の目的であったネド王子の救出は
思惑通りに終わったわけだが――
Translation:
The rescue of Prince Ned, which was the immediate goal
of the project, ended as planned...

Source string: 次の動きが気になるところだな
Translation: It'll be interesting to see what they do next.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の討伐が解放軍の目的とすれば
次はいかなる道を進むのか――
Translation:
If the goal of the Liberation Army is to defeat the "evil dragon,"
what path will it take next?

Source string:
協力を惜しむ必要はないが
レスタニアの利を忘れるなよ
Translation:
You don't have to be generous with your cooperation, but don't forget
Lestania's advantage.

Source string:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
Translation:
As the liberation forces gain momentum
the chaos in Aqqachelan will become more and more

Source string: 短期決戦と相成ればよいが
Translation: I hope it's a short war.

Source string: 敵の攻勢は予想通りだ
Translation: The enemy's offensive is predictable.

Source string:
メイロワ将軍も策を講じていることだろう
しのぎきれば未来は明るいぞ
Translation:
I'm sure General Meyerova is working on a plan
If you can keep it together, the future is bright.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”め！
アッカーシェランの次はこのレスタニア――
Translation:
The evil dragon!
After Acker Sheran, this Lestania...

Source string:
それが狙いだというのなら
思い上がりも甚だしいわい
Translation:
If that's what you're after,
, you're being very presumptuous.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation: Is it even okay to take the words of the "evil dragon" literally

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”の言葉を文字通りに信じても
良いのだろうか
Translation: Is it even okay to take the words of the "evil dragon" literally

Source string: あぁ――疑念の沼は底なしだな
Translation: Ah--the swamp of doubt is bottomless.

Source string:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
Translation:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

Source string:
危険は避けられないとしても
無謀な行動は慎むのだぞ
Translation:
Even though danger is inevitable,
you must refrain from reckless behavior.

Source string:
奪われた城を取り戻すという悲願の成就
解放軍の面々はさぞ喜んでいるだろう
Translation:
The fulfillment of the long-held dream of regaining the castle that was taken from us
I'm sure the liberation army is very happy to see you.

Source string: 想像するとわたしまで頬が緩むわ
Translation: I can't help but smile when I think about it.

Source string:
“悪しき竜”が絶望の大陸と呼んだ
アッカーシェランの状況は大いに変わった
Translation:
The "evil dragon" called it a continent of despair.
The situation in Acker Sheran has changed a lot.

Source string: こうなると奴の沈黙が不気味だな
Translation: His silence is eerie when it comes to this.

Source string:
おまえたちも同じだろうが、わたしの頭の中は
黒い鎧の騎士でいっぱいだ
Translation:
I know you guys are the same way, but my head is full of
knights in black armor!

Source string:
“悪しき竜”といい黒い騎士といい
姿を見せずに我々を翻弄するとは――
なんと卑劣な者たちだ
Translation:
The "evil dragon" and the black knight,
who play with us without showing themselves--
What despicable people they are!

Source string: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
Translation: Calm down -- calm down.

Source string:
ブラッドオーブは続々と集まっているが
効果は薄いと言わざるをえないのだ
Translation:
Blood Orbs are coming together in droves, but
I have to say that the effect is not very good!

Source string:
レスタニアの未来は文字どおり
おまえたちの活躍にかかっている
Translation:
The future of Lestania literally depends on
your success!

Source string:
思えば、わたしの記憶の中の白竜は
いつも病み、苦しんでいた
しかし、これほど痛ましい状況は初めてだ
Translation:
Thinking back, the white dragon in my memory
was always sick and suffering
but never in such a tragic situation!

Source string:
もう一刻の猶予も許されないのだろう
さあ、行ってくれ
Translation:
I guess not a moment more is allowed.
Now go on.

Source string:
ごくろうだったな
ゆっくりと休んでくれ
Translation:
Thanks for your time.
Have a good rest.

Source string:
いや、もちろん、歌い、食べ、大いに語るのもよい
好きにしなさい
多少のことは多めに見よう
Translation:
No, of course, sing, eat, and talk a great deal
Do as you please
More or less

Source string:
リズから聞いたところによると
ネド王子が行方不明なのだとか
しかも自分の意志で城を出たらしい
Translation:
Liz told me that
Prince Ned is missing
and that he left the castle of his own volition.

Source string: この期に及んでいったい何事だろうな
Translation: What in the world is going on at this point in time?

Source string:
こんなことを言うとまた嫌われるのだろうが
アッカーシェラン側が口裏を合わせて
我々を騙そうとしている可能性も
皆無ではない
Translation:
I'm sure you'll hate me for saying this again, but
it's possible that Acker Sheran's side is trying to fool us by talking out of their asses

it's not impossible that they're trying to fool all of us.

Source string:
ほら、そんな顔をするな
あくまでも可能性の話だ
Translation:
See, don't give me that look.
It's only a possibility.

Source string:
この状況――
これまでの経緯を思えば王子に悪意が
あるとは思えない
Translation:
This situation--
Given what we've seen so far, I don't think the prince has any ill intentions

Source string:
しかし――
もう少し仕える者たちを大切にせねば
国を治めるのは難しいだろうな
Translation:
But--
we need to take a little more care of those who serve us
or it will be hard to govern the country.

Source string:
もちろん王子の安全をいち早く確保して
気持ちを尊重すべく話し合うことも重要だ
Translation:
Of course, it's important to ensure the prince's safety as soon as possible and to discuss
to respect his feelings.

Source string:
しかしそろそろおまえたちだけでも
気持ちを竜退治に切り替えた方が
良いのかもしれんぞ
Translation:
But maybe it's time for you guys to
switch your minds to dragon slaying

Source string:
ふん――
重大な事はいくらでもあるというのに
エリオットのことばかり考えてしまう
Translation:
Hmmm--
There are plenty of serious things to do
I can't stop thinking about Elliot.

Source string:
竜と竜力、そして大地の恵みが不可分で
ある以上、竜のいない大陸は
考えられない
Translation:
Since dragons, dragon power, and the blessings of the earth are inseparable
, a continent without dragons is
unthinkable!

Source string:
とすれば竜力の継承抜きに竜の討伐は
考えられないとは思わんか？
Translation:
Then don't you think it's
inconceivable to defeat a dragon without inheriting dragon power?

Source string:
いやはや――
この事件を記録に残さねばならないが
Translation:
Oh no--
I must put this incident on the record, but

Source string:
やはりわたしも一度はアッカーシェランを
訪ねる必要があるようだ
Translation: I guess I need to visit Acker Chelan at least once

Source string:
ほう、《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
Translation:
Wow, you brought the ""lv.80"" growth pearl.
This is another valuable thing you got.

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブをLV.80に上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
――もちろん、ジョブポイントも上限まで貯まる
Translation:
With this, you can raise your current job to lv.80
and raise your skills and abilities to the maximum
except for special ones
--and of course, you can accumulate job points to the maximum.

Source string:
これを持ってきたということは、今のジョブで
《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を使うのか？
Translation:
If you brought this, does that mean you will use
《"LV.80 "Growth Pearl》 with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
Translation:
Well,
it's valuable.
take your time to think about it and use it.

Source string:
――これはすまぬ
そのジョブには《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》は
効果が無いのだ
別のジョブで考え直してみてくれ
Translation:
--Sorry about this
The ""LV.80"" Growth Pearl has no
effect on that job.
Think again with a different job.

Source string:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Now let us release the power of the Pearl
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
無事LV.80になったようだぞ
さて、次はスキルだな
――もう一度目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Looks like you made it to lvl. 80 without incident.
Now, on to the skills.
--Close your eyes once more.

Source string:
スキルの確認は落ち着いてからにしなさい
よし、最後はアビリティか
――目を閉じて集中するのだ
Translation:
Check your skills only after you've calmed down.
Okay, the last thing you need is abilities.
--Close your eyes and concentrate.

Source string:
これでこのジョブのアビリティも
特殊なもの以外は全ておまえのものとなったぞ
Translation:
Now all the abilities of this job
are yours, except for the special ones!

Source string:
どのように成長したかは
見た目ではわからないからな
アーチボルトのところへ行って
確認してみることをすすめるよ
Translation:
You can't tell how they've grown by looking at
, so I suggest you go to
Archibald's and check out

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
Translation:
It takes a little time to release the power of the treasure
It would be better to go ahead and break up the party
You might make the party members wait
unprovoked.

Source string:
――気付いているだろうが
このジョブはすでにLV.80に達しているな
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
--I'm sure you've noticed
This job has already reached lv. 80.
The effect of level up is wasted, but
Do you still use the treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブで《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、上げられるスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
Translation:
Hmmm - it seems that there is no skill that can be raised by using the ""LV.80"" Growth Pearl
with this job
, although the effects related to the skill are wasted.
Can I use the Pearl?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
これは――このまま《「LV.80」成長の宝珠》を
使っても、効果のあるアビリティは無いようだぞ
今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
This is--if you continue to use the ["lv.80" Growth Pearl]
, there doesn't seem to be any abilities that work!
You're going to use the Pearl with your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
Translation:
Well
if you're happy with it
I have nothing more to say.

Source string:
それでは、宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Now let us unleash the power of the Pearl
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
これは強い竜力が篭められた宝珠だな
この宝珠の力を解放して白竜に捧げれば
おまえの《竜力の継承》は完全なものとなるだろう
Translation:
This is a treasured gem that contains strong dragon power.
If you release the power of this gem and offer it to the white dragon,
your "Inheritance of Dragon Power" will be complete.

Source string:
ここに持ってきたということは
今、この宝珠の竜力を解放してもよいのか？
Translation:
You brought it here, which means
can I release the dragon power of this treasure now?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているのだな
Translation:
How--
You've already finished all the "Inheritance of Dragon Power"

Source string:
この宝珠は自らの力で腕を磨いたおまえには
不要なものだったようだ
まさに覚者の鑑よ
Translation:
It seems that this pearl was not necessary for you
who honed your skills by your own power
, a true savant.

Source string:
《竜力の継承》には何の影響もないが
前途を祝して、宝珠の力を解放しておくか
力は大地を巡り、またいつの日か
おまえの元へ戻ろう
Translation:
It has no effect on the "Inheritance of Dragon Power", but
I will release the power of the Pearl to celebrate the way forward.
The power will travel the earth, and one day
it will return to you again.

Source string:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
Translation:
All the "Inheritance of Dragon Power" is done.
See what kind of power you got!

Source string:
おまえが持ってきたこの宝珠
篭められた力を解放することで
より冒険がしやすくなるというものだ
Translation:
This pearl you brought with you
will make your adventures easier
by releasing the power locked away in it.

Source string:
たとえば、各エリアランクが上昇したり
リム転移先とできる礎が解放されるといった
働きだな
Translation:
For example, it works
by increasing the rank of each area or
releasing cornerstones that can be used as a rim transfer destination.

Source string: ――さて、この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation: --Now, shall we unleash the power of this treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
そういえば、おまえはすでに
かなりの礎に触れ、エリアに貢献して
きたのではないか？
Translation:
Come to think of it, you've already touched
quite a few cornerstones and contributed
to the area, haven't you?

Source string:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
Releasing the power of this pearl may not have
much effect.
Still, may I release the power of this pearl?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放することで
各地とおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
Translation:
By releasing the power of the Pearl,
your ties to the regions will
grow stronger.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放したぞ
本来の効果は得られずとも
解放した力は大地を巡り
またいつの日かおまえの元へ戻るだろう
Translation:
I've released the power of the treasure
even if you don't get the original effect
the power I've released will travel the earth
and return to you again someday.

Source string:
ほう、
《<VAL>》
を持ってきたのか
これはまた貴重な物を手に入れたものだ
Translation:
Wow,
《<VAL>》 You brought

This is another valuable thing you've got.

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブを上げ
スキルやアビリティに関しても、特殊なもの以外
上限まで引き上げることができる
Translation:
With this, you can raise your current job
and raise your skills and abilities to the
maximum, except for special ones.

Source string:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation:
》<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
宝珠の力を解放するには少し時間がかかる
パーティーは一度解散してきた方がよかろう
パーティーメンバーを無暗に
待たせてしまうかもしれん
Translation:
It takes a little time to release the power of the treasure
It would be better to go ahead and break up the party
You might make the party members wait
unprovoked.

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブでは
《<VAL>》
を使っても
レベルアップの効果が無駄になってしまうが
それでも宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
Hmmm -- with this job
《<VAL>》
, the
level up effect is wasted, but
you still use the treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
ふむ――このジョブで
《<VAL>》
を使っても、解放するスキルが無いようだ
スキルに関する効果が無駄になってしまうが
宝珠を使ってもよいのか？
Translation:
Hmmm -- it seems that if I use
《<VAL>》
on this job, there are no skills to release
The effects related to the skills will be wasted
Can I use a treasured pearl?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
これは――このまま
《<VAL>》
を使っても、開放するアビリティは無いようだぞ
それでも、今のジョブで宝珠を使うのか？
Translation:
This is--if you keep
《<VAL>》
using it, there doesn't seem to be any abilities to open it up.
Still, you're going to use the treasure in your current job?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
そうか
おまえが納得しているのなら
わたしからこれ以上言うことはない
Translation:
Well
if you're happy with it
I have nothing more to say.

Source string:
――よろしい
無事、レベルがあがったようだぞ
Translation:
-- Good.
Looks like you're safe and leveled up.

Source string:
――よろしい
無事、スキルが解放されたようだぞ
Translation:
-- Good.
Looks like you've successfully released your skill set.

Source string:
――これで
アビリティは無事、解放されたようだぞ
Translation:
--This
ability now seems to have been successfully released!

Source string:
さあ、行け覚者よ
白竜様の加護があらんことを――
Translation:
Now, go, wise one,
and may the blessings of the White Dragon--

Source string:
それでは宝珠の力を解放しよう
――心を静かに、目を閉じるがよい
Translation:
Now let us release the power of the Pearl
--Quiet your mind and close your eyes.

Source string:
そうか
貴重な物だからな
じっくり考えて使うといい
Translation:
Well,
it's valuable.
take your time to think about it and use it.

Source string:
ほう、これは
《<VAL>》
だな
Translation:
Well, this is
《<VAL>》

Source string:
これを使えば、今のジョブの
スキルやアビリティを
解放することができる
Translation:
This will allow you to unlock
skills and abilities of your current job

Source string:
《<VAL>》
この宝珠の力を解放するか？
Translation:
》<VAL>》
Will you release the power of this treasure?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
ほう――
すでにすべての《竜力の継承》を
終えているようだぞ
Translation:
How--
You've already finished all the "Inheritance of Dragon Power"

Source string:
おまえはすでに多くのエリアに貢献している
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
さしたる効果は得られないかもしれぬ
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
You've already contributed to many areas
releasing the power of this pearl
may not have much effect
may I still release the power of this pearl?

Source string: はい
Translation: Yes, sir.

Source string: いいえ
Translation: No, sir.

Source string:
この宝珠の力を解放したところで
転移の礎に何の影響もないが
それでも、この宝珠の力を解放してもよいか？
Translation:
Releasing the power of this pearl will have no effect on
the foundation of the transfer, but
still, may I release the power of this pearl?

Source string:
すべての《竜力の継承》が終わったぞ
どのような力を得たのか、確認してみなさい
Translation:
All the "Inheritance of Dragon Power" is done.
See what kind of power you got!

Source string:
――うむ
これで各地のエリアとおまえの結び付きは
より強固なものとなるだろう
Translation:
--umm
