This will strengthen your ties to the various areas

Source string:
――これで
転移の礎は無事、解放されたようだ
Translation:
--This
seems to have successfully freed the cornerstone of the transition.

Source string: どうした、深刻な顔だな
Translation: What's wrong? You look serious.

Source string:
覚者であることには慣れたか？
道は――見えたか？
Translation:
Are you used to being a savant?
Have you found your way?

Source string: 体は常に鍛えておけよ
Translation: You've got to keep your body in shape.

Source string:
悪いな
茶飲み話なら、後にしてくれ
Translation:
Sorry
if you want to have a cup of tea, you can do that later.

Source string:
覚者として生きるということは
白竜と世界の行く末を見届ける――ということだ
Translation:
To live as an enlightened person is to
see the end of the white dragon and the world...

Source string: やるべきことをやろう――お互いにな
Translation: Let's do what we have to do--to each other.

Source string:
気を抜くなよ
絶対に安全な場所なんてのは無いからな
Translation:
Stay tuned
because there's no such thing as an absolutely safe place.

Source string:
腕試しに一戦やるか？
おっと、そんな顔するな――冗談さ
Translation:
You want to try your hand at a fight?
Oops, don't give me that look--I'm kidding.

Source string:
おまえは感じたことはないか？
自分の真ん中を貫く、熱いモノ――
それが揺らぎ、壊れてしまう不安を
Translation:
Have you ever felt that?
That hot thing that pierces through the middle of you--
the fear that it will waver and break?

Source string:
忘れるな
俺たちは覚者――使命に生き、使命に死す者だ
Translation:
Remember,
we are the enlightened - living the mission, dying the mission.

Source string: どうした。俺には遠慮は無用だ
Translation: What's the matter? Don't be shy with me.

Source string: 覚者ひまなし――いつものことだ
Translation: No savant daylight--always.

Source string:
言っておくが、俺が面倒を見てやれるのは
おまえが行くべき場所――
戦うべき相手の指示だけだ
Translation:
I'm telling you, I can only take care of
where you need to go--
and tell you who to fight.

Source string:
衣食の面倒までは見切れないから
自分でなんとかしてくれ
Translation:
I can't take care of your food and clothing, so
you're on your own.

Source string:
時間を作って、なるべく歩きまわれ
神殿をくまなく見て回るのもいいし
遠出してみるのもいいだろう
Translation:
Make time to walk around as much as possible.
You can look all over the temple or
go far away!

Source string:
探究心を忘れず、常に新しいものに触れろ
覚者の人生は長い
退屈すると――つらいぞ
Translation:
Keep inquiring and always be exposed to new things.
The life of a savant is long.
If you get bored--it's hard!

Source string: アークの話は知っているか？
Translation: Do you know the story of ARC?

Source string:
派遣した調査団が調べているのだろうが
早く正体を知りたいものだな
Translation:
I'm sure the investigative team they've sent is looking into it.
I can't wait to find out who they are.

Source string: メイリーフがなついているようだな
Translation: Looks like you've got a soft spot for Mayleaf.

Source string:
よし、今後、あの子のことは
おまえに任せるとしよう
Translation:
Okay, I'll leave her to you
from now on.

Source string:
ご苦労だったな
とりあえず今は何もない
Translation:
Thanks for your efforts.
Nothing for now anyway.

Source string: 休むか遊ぶか――好きにしてくれ
Translation: Rest or play--you do what you want.

Source string:
イリスの件で動いてくれたそうだな
俺からも礼をいう
世話になった
Translation:
I heard you worked on Iris's case
Thanks from me too
Thanks for your help.

Source string:
いいのか――
俺たち覚者はこのままでいいのだろうか――
Translation:
Are you sure--
are we savants going to be able to keep this up--?

Source string:
白竜の力――
少しでも多く継承できれば――
Translation:
The power of the white dragon--
If I could inherit as much as possible--

Source string:
多少無理をしてでもメイリーフを
連れ戻して欲しかったが――
まあ、今はそのキースヒルトを信じるしか
ないようだな
Translation:
I wanted to bring Mayleaf back to
even if it was a bit of a stretch--
Well, I guess we'll just have to trust that Keith Hilt
for now.

Source string:
メイリーフも普通の娘ではないから
そう簡単に敵の手に落ちたりはしないだろう
Translation:
Mayleaf is no ordinary girl
and won't fall into the hands of the enemy so easily.

Source string:
彼女の信頼を裏切るような者がいれば
話は別だが――
Translation:
If someone betrays her trust,
would be a different story--

Source string:
イリスのことは俺にまかせてくれ
長い付き合いだ
Translation:
I'll take care of Iris.
We've known each other a long time.

Source string:
話せば――わかるさ
ああ――きっとわかる
Translation:
Talk to him--you'll understand.
Yeah--you'll understand.

Source string:
敵の会話に登場したエルフとは
間違いなくキースヒルトのことだ
狙われているとあれば放ってはおけない
Translation:
The elf in the enemy conversation is
definitely Keith Hilt
If he's being targeted, we can't leave him alone.

Source string:
腐れモゴックめ――
ただですむと思うなよ
Translation:
You rotten mogok--
Don't think you can get away with this for free.

Source string: キースヒルトの死はけして無駄ではない
Translation: Keith Hilt's death was not in vain.

Source string:
白竜に命が捧げられる限り――
誰の命も無駄にはならない
Translation:
As long as lives are dedicated to the White Dragon--
no one's life will be wasted.

Source string: ディアマンテス――
Translation: Diamantes--

Source string:
その男がアークを送り込み――
ズールを使ってオークを取りまとめ――
イリスの正気とキースヒルトの命を奪った――
Translation:
That man sent Ark--
to use Zool to rally the orcs--
and took Iris's sanity and Keith Hilt's life.

Source string:
何者だ、ディアマンテス――
いや、聞いたことはある
レスタニアを繁栄の世界から戦場に変えた
張本人――
Translation:
Who are you, Diamantes--
No, I've heard of you.
The man who turned Lestania from a prosperous world into a war zone
The man who--

Source string: どこにいる――今すぐにでも倒してやる！
Translation: Where are they - I'll take them down right now!

Source string:
ジョゼフが最善を尽くそうとしていることは
わかっているが――さすがに焦れるな
Translation:
I know Joseph is trying to do his best
-- but he's in a hurry indeed!

Source string:
覚者として生きることに
見返りを求めたことはなかったが
Translation:
I never asked
for anything in return for living as a savant, but

Source string: この仕打ちは――なんだ――
Translation: What is this-- what is this-- what is this?

Source string:
何？
わたしの顔に、何かついてる？
Translation:
What?
Do I have something on my face?

Source string: 難しい顔しちゃって――悩みでもあるの？
Translation: You look so difficult - what's troubling you?

Source string:
楽しい時間って、限られてるから
価値あるんだよね
Translation:
Fun times are limited, so
it's worth it.

Source string:
わたしには力がある
だから、それを使うのは当然――うん、当然
Translation:
I have power
so it's only natural to use it--yes, only natural!

Source string:
わからないんだよね
何が正しくて、何が間違ってるのか――
Translation:
I don't know,
what's right and what's wrong--

Source string:
敵を倒して、魔物を狩って――
もっと強くなれば別の生き方が見えるのかな
Translation:
Defeat the enemy, hunt the demons--
I wonder if I can see another way of life if I become more powerful.

Source string:
さあ、どうするの？
覚者なら、迷いなんてないでしょ？
Translation:
What are you going to do now?
If you're an enlightened person, you don't have any doubts, do you?

Source string: ――あんた目付き、レオに似てきたね
Translation: --Your eyes are starting to resemble Leo's.

Source string:
自信持っていいんじゃない？
あんたなら、できそうな気がする
Translation:
You should have confidence.
I think you can do it.

Source string:
結局さ、どうなるかわかんないよね
世界なんてさ
Translation:
After all, you never know what's going to happen
the world.

Source string: なに？　なになに？
Translation: What?　What what what?

Source string:
あんたなかなかやるよね
これでわたし、楽できるかも？
Translation:
You're pretty good at that.
Maybe this will make things easier for me?

Source string: そういえば、ファビオって覚者とは会った？
Translation: Oh, by the way, did you meet Fabio, the savant?

Source string:
いい奴だから、覚えておきなよ
ファビオね、ファビオ
Translation:
He's a good guy, so remember him.
Fabio, right, Fabio.

Source string:
ああ、忙しい――
誰かさんの人使いが荒いのか
わたしの要領が悪いのか――
Translation:
Oh, I'm busy--
someone's being a jerk or
I'm not being very helpful or--

Source string:
手伝ってあげられなくてごめんよ
わたしはわたしで忙しくてさ
Translation:
Sorry I couldn't help you
I've been busy myself.

Source string:
さっそくご活躍だね！
うん、いいよぉ
Translation:
I see you've been active right away!
Yeah, it's good.

Source string:
あんたが頑張ってくれるとわたしがちょっと
楽になるからね！
Translation:
I'll be a little
more comfortable if you work hard!

Source string: わくわくするね
Translation: I'm excited.

Source string:
重要な話か？
違うなら後にしてくれ
Translation:
Is this important?
If not, you can talk about it later.

Source string: ふん――ひまそうだな
Translation: Hmm--you look like you're busy.

Source string:
時間があるのなら
外の魔物でも倒してきたらどうだ
Translation:
If you have the time,
why don't you go out there and kill some demons.

Source string:
規律なくして人は動かぬ
例外は――ない
Translation:
Without discipline, people don't work.
No exceptions--no exceptions.

Source string:
覚者とは、常に責務を負う者
白竜に、地に、人に――
すべてに仕える者だということを忘れるな
Translation:
A wise man is one who always has a duty
to the white dragon, to the earth, to man--
Remember, you are a servant to all!

Source string:
くれぐれも己の力に溺れるなよ
どんな戦士も、過信という泥沼には
簡単に足を取られる
Translation:
Don't dwell on your own strength
Any warrior can easily get bogged down
in the quagmire of overconfidence

Source string:
覚者は勝手な連中が多いが――
貴殿は悪習に染まるなよ
Translation:
Many enlightened people are self-serving, but--
you are not to be tainted by bad habits.

Source string:
死を覚悟し、同時に生を諦めないこと
それが戦場で生きのびる秘訣だ
Translation:
Be prepared to die and not give up on life at the same time.
That's the secret to survival on the battlefield.

Source string:
人智を超えた敵であろうと、我らは戦わねばならない
それが騎士というものだ
Translation:
We must fight even against enemies beyond human understanding.
That's what knighthood is all about!

Source string:
覚者といえども軍規には従ってもらう
仲間の命を守るためだ
Translation:
Even sentient people have to follow military regulations
to protect the lives of their fellow man.

Source string: ほう？　我々騎士団に何用だ
Translation: What?　What do you want with us Knights?

Source string:
礼節を忘れるな
この《謁見の間》では特にな
Translation:
Don't forget civility.
Especially in this "audience chamber.

Source string:
グリッテン砦のヴァネッサ殿が
来ているようだが――
騎士団は蚊帳の外か？
Translation:
It seems that Lady Vanessa of Fort Gritten is
coming--
Is the Order out of the mosquito net?

Source string:
騎士団の犠牲は竜の力となることで
報われる――ああ、そうとも
Translation:
The Knights' sacrifices will be rewarded by becoming the dragon's power
--oh, yes, and yes.
